description: FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!!!  Mazer is a great game where you tilt your phone to guide a metal ball around an endless number of mazes. Not only that, it's Four fun games in one!  Mazer is the only maze game you'll ever need!  Qualify for increasingly challenging puzzles, from easy starter mazes to mind-bending huge mazes. Levels are generated automatically so Mazer provides endless hours of fun. Race against an opponent to get to the finish line. Start off against a slow guy with no sense of direction and eventually try your wits and reflexes against a golden bullet!   In Cannonball, roll the ball around many different obstacles, including walls, holes, Evil-Goldie-Balls-Of-Doom, bullets and more! Over 125 Cannonball levels are included, with more being added all the time.  With the GLOBAL SCOREBOARD, match your skill against the rest of the world!  In Chaser, run away from four deadler Chasers which follow you everywhere, grab jewels to boost your score, get the Power Pills to turn the tables on the hunters, and compare your scores with the rest of the world with a global scoreboard!! ----------------- v1.3.5 adds some levels
